short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Twitter videos and GIFs using Tweeload.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tweeload is an online tool to download videos and GIFs from Twitter. The Tweeload extension makes it extremely easy to download media from the Twitter website.

A Download button will appear below every Tweet containing any videos. Clicking on the Download button will take you straight to the download page where you can download any video from that particular Tweet.
